document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of Melf's acid arrow''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s that contained destructive magic that could be unleashed upon command.
document_data.Description: Wands of this type had long, strong shafts measuring {{SI|1'3|'"|long=yes}} in length. They were usually made using bone, [[ivory]], or [[wood]] and the wands' top part held a sophisticated swirling design. The total number of charges varied from wand to wand.
document_data.Powers: Each of these items held several charges of ''[[Melf's acid arrow]]'' [[spell]]. The magics held within the wand could be discharged at will using a command word. Upon expenditure of a wand's last charge, it disintegrated.
document_data.Creation: A ''wand of Melf's acid arrow'' could be created from a horn of an adult [[black dragon]].{{Cite dragon/332/Cutting Up the Dragon|56}}
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Antasillix]], a [[fiendish]] [[green dragon]] of [[Unther]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
*[[Horrsin Zespar]], one of the first [[Extaminaar]] who was tasked with subterfuge in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
*[[Vesryn Aelorothi]], a [[fey'ri]] [[sorcerer]] of [[House Aelorothi]] of [[Siluvanede]] in the early 1370s DR.
